result.name: Sheringham Nursery School and Children's Centre

reviews.text: My daughter has been going to this Nursery for the past two months. She's really attached to her care worker Tatiyana. I find them very professional and helpful. Tatiyana is really friendly and works hard at helping my daughter develop.

One of the best nursery schools, this is my sisters school. She ABSOLUTELY loves it ! A staff teacher called "Rahima" is her teacher currently, she says Rahima is fun. This nursery is soo fun ! Recommended to send children to this lovely helpful fun school !
This is the best kindergarten in the world.  The teachers there are very good.  thanks to the entire team.  from the red room.  .❤️❤️❤️

Worst staff ever, absolutely rude and judgemental. My son was there a few years ago, Raheema his key worker was the nastiest and most heartless person I have ever come across. She never had his best interest at heart, expressionless, rude and obnoxious at most times, she was only nice to the people who spoke the same language as her. She showed nothing but hatred towards me and my family while I saw her drag one of the children by the arm once. Do not trust these people.

I recently moved in to the area Lindsey (Headteacher/ Senco)/Marion (family support worker) and Samina (family support worker) are so friendly. It's been 2 weeks since my daughters have started the nursery and they have reassured me with everything. Both my daughters key workers are amazing and their name is Emily and Kristine are two amazing key workers. I gave 5 stars based on the people that have dealt with in a well mannered way.

address: Sheringham Ave, London E12 5PB, United Kingdom
